pkgmetadata.longdescription: Thermoluminescence Glow Curve Deconvolution // Deconvolving first-order and general-order thermoluminescence glow curves using a modified Levenberg-Marquardt algorithm. It provides the possibility of setting constraints or fixing any of parameters. It offers an interactive way to initialize parameters by clicking with a mouse on a plot at positions where peak maxima should be located. The optimal estimate is obtained by "Try- and-error". It also provides routines for simulating first-, second-, and general-order glow peaks (or glow curves).
